description: After a healthier snack idea the little ones will love? Whip up this rainbow fruit salad with passionfruit yoghurt and see their faces light up.
name: Rainbow Fruit Salad With Passionfruit Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids,Kids snack
recipeIngredient: 1 small Calypso mango, peeled, cut into 2cm pieces
0.75 cup Woolworths Greek style yoghurt light

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange mango, strawberries, blueberries and coconut in sections in a rectangular airtight container.
Place yoghurt in a small airtight container and top with passionfruit pulp. Cover containers with lids and keep chilled until ready to serve.
